Text:
I've uploaded about 1,5TB in 1,5 months.
I'm uploading as fast as I can.
I promise to seed for a year after completing the download. :D Everyone please help seed.
Episodes from 197 forward don't have subtitles at all so you have to find them from someplace else.
My mistake... VLC player shows subs correctly (i think, dl'd from other source again and had same prob) but Media Player Classic and windows media player don't show subs automatically.
